verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> a bond-servant of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> for the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of those <S%G1588>chosen<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> which is <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G2150>godliness,<s%>

but at the <S%G2398>proper<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G5319>manifested,<s%> [even] His <S%G3056>word,<s%> in the <S%G2782>proclamation<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> I was <S%G4100>entrusted<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior;<s%>

to <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> my <S%G1103>true<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> in a <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5484>reason<s%> I <S%G620>left<s%> you in <S%G2914>Crete,<s%> that you might <S%G1930>set<s%> in <S%G1930>order<s%> what <S%G3007>remains,<s%> and <S%G2525>appoint<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> as I <S%G1299>directed<s%> you,

For the <S%G1985>overseer<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G410>above<s%> <S%G410>reproach<s%> as God's <S%G3623>steward,<s%> not self-willed, not quick-tempered, not <S%G3943>addicted<s%> to <S%G3943>wine,<s%> not <S%G4131>pugnacious,<s%> not <S%G146>fond<s%> of <S%G146>sordid<s%> <S%G146>gain,<s%>

<S%G472>holding<s%> <S%G472>fast<s%> the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> which is in <S%G2596>accordance<s%> with the <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> that he may be <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G3870>exhort<s%> in <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> and to <S%G1651>refute<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G483>contradict.<s%>

For there are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G506>rebellious<s%> <S%G506>men,<s%> <S%G3151>empty<s%> <S%G3151>talkers<s%> and <S%G5423>deceivers,<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> of the <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G1993>silenced<s%> <S%G3748>because<s%> they are <S%G396>upsetting<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3624>families,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G3739>things<s%> they <S%G1163>should<s%> not [teach], for the <S%G5484>sake<s%> of <S%G150>sordid<s%> <S%G2771>gain.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> is <S%G227>true.<s%> For <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> <S%G1651>reprove<s%> them <S%G664>severely<s%> that they may be <S%G5198>sound<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith,<s%>

not <S%G4337>paying<s%> <S%G4337>attention<s%> to <S%G2451>Jewish<s%> <S%G3454>myths<s%> and <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> who <S%G654>turn<s%> <S%G654>away<s%> from the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

To the <S%G2513>pure,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G2513>pure;<s%> but to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G3392>defiled<s%> and <S%G571>unbelieving,<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> is <S%G2513>pure,<s%> but <S%G2532>both<s%> their <S%G3563>mind<s%> and their <S%G4893>conscience<s%> are <S%G3392>defiled.<s%>

They <S%G3670>profess<s%> to <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> but by [their] <S%G2041>deeds<s%> they <S%G720>deny<s%> [Him], <S%G1510>being<s%> <S%G947>detestable<s%> and <S%G545>disobedient,<s%> and <S%G96>worthless<s%> for <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>deed.<s%>
